description: Early 18th c., ante- +‎ diluvial, possibly as alteration of earlier antediluvian.

adjectives.description: antediluvial (comparative more antediluvial, superlative most antediluvial)

entries.meaning: (biblical) Of or pertaining to a time before Noah's flood.

examples: Synonyms: antediluvian, defunct, outdated; see also Thesaurus:obsolete
